name: Dino Bros
description:
Join Dino-Bro on his epic adventure to defeat the bread king!

Originally a LD32 game, Dino Bros has been cleaned up and expanded on in all of it's glory!

Crummy Demo version: ONLY ONE HAT

Amazing micro-transaction like version: SO MANY HATS

This game was made by @josefnpat for the April 2015 OneGameAMonth challenge.

Release History

v35

  • Enemies now despawn from screen.
  • Adjusting shadow location to better fit feet.
  • Invulnerability now doesn't cause seizures.
  • Fixed the code to allow wide hats.
  • Can't hit dead corpses anymore.
  • Landing now hits enemies.
  • Screenshake!
  • Increased attack area.
  • Player is now invulnerable longer when hit.
  • More king scripting.
  • Bread re-targets every second for fun!
  • Bread now start with different walk cycles.
  • Lots of hats! (Amazing Elite Release Only $1!)
  • Jump range reduced.
  • Level 2 balance.
  • Menu update.

v27

  • LD Jam Bugfix Release
